Text: Why was episode 3 left out?  I just burned this to disk and just now noticed it.
Oh dear god I hate Phil Hellmuth so much. Soo much..

LOL, I don't mind Phillip 'Hellmouth' Hellmuth, even though he is quite abhorrent sometimes, apart from when he puts his chips in the pot really fast. I hate him when he does that. One of the players on this programme 'Sean Sheikhan' is even more abhorrent than Hellmouth
